enhancedContent.overview:
StoicOS - Second Brain transforms life management into an epic RPG-style adventure with Stoic philosophy theming. This free template gamifies productivity by turning your goals into quests, building real-life skills that level up, and adding an element of chance with the Fortuna's Favor wheel. It's personal development meets video game mechanics, designed to make self-improvement genuinely engaging rather than another boring to-do list.

With over 339 sales, StoicOS proves that gamification can motivate sustained engagement with productivity systems. The template integrates task management (called 'Duties'), skill development across multiple life domains (fitness, nutrition, mindfulness, philosophy), project pages, and a quest system that rewards completion with experience points, coins, and Fortuna spins. This neuroscience-backed reward mechanism taps into the same motivation systems that make games addictive, applied to real-life achievement.

Beyond the gamification, StoicOS provides genuinely comprehensive life tracking: workout logging, calorie tracking with recipe database, health metrics from wearables, daily journaling for mood and energy, and integrated note-taking. It's a complete second brain system wrapped in RPG aesthetics that makes grinding through daily responsibilities feel like conquering quests.

faqs.question: How do I get started with this template?
faqs.answer: Duplicate StoicOS to your workspace and start by setting up your first quest. Add some daily duties (tasks), then complete them to earn experience and Fortuna spins. The gamification mechanics will guide you through exploring the different skill areas.

faqs.question: What's included in this template?
faqs.answer: A complete gamified life system including: Duties (task management), Skills system with Cooking/Strength/Constitution/Mindfulness/Philosophy levels, Quest system with rewards, Fortuna's Favor wheel, Project pages, integrated notes, and comprehensive health tracking.

faqs.question: Can I customize this template?
faqs.answer: Yes, you can modify the quest rewards, add new skill categories, adjust the Fortuna's Favor probabilities, and customize the Stoic theme while maintaining the core gamification mechanics.

faqs.question: What are the main use cases?
faqs.answer: Ideal for gamifying personal development, making fitness and nutrition tracking engaging, managing projects and tasks with RPG-style progression, maintaining daily mindfulness practices, and creating a fun second brain system that sustains long-term engagement.
